briefdescription.para: moves unit to a given fixed location
moves a unit to within a distance to another unit
each action has its own update functionality which gets called when this is the active action
action to perform when popped from a units action stack
gets called for all actions on stack each update cycle

simplesect.para: true when action is completed so it and everything above it can be popped

briefdescription.para: checks if the action can be interrupted, allowing it to be popped if the user specifies a new action, if false the action must reach a completed state before removal eg dead action must be completed and cannot be discarded
control whether stack can discard the action automatically and should the stack be modifiable when this action is on top

detaileddescription.para: if true this action must complete and will not allow new actions to be pushed while it is active and also does not update the secondary actions

briefdescription.para: debug string to identify action types
use a star to find a path to target
moves an entity to another location
